data.title: 404 - Page not found when accessing repos with Azure
data.meta_description: I was able to log into my Organization's Azure Dashboard and the only thing that is missing on the left side bar is the repos.
data.text:
If it's not a disabled "Repos" in Options as Matt wrote, ask your administrator to check your Access Level in Organization Settings.

We had similar issue recently, and it turned out, user had "Visual Studio Subscriber" assigned in settings, but no subscription assigned to Microsoft Account. Changing to Basic solves the problem.

Are you the project administrator? It is possible that Repos are disabled for that project for all users. You can find this under the project settings, Overview tab.
